pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Prevent interaction with models apart from the one being edited

content.raw: If I have the model manipulator attached a model then I enter the model editor mode, it will still let me drag that model. May be we can trigger the arrow mode when entering the editor? e.g. calling `g_arrowAct->trigger()`
content.html: If I have the model manipulator attached a model then I enter the model editor mode, it will still let me drag that model. May be we can trigger the arrow mode when entering the editor? e.g. calling g_arrowAct->trigger()
